name: Malavolti Aviation Services
about: Malavolti Aviation Services, established in May 2013 by Ethan Malavolti, is a comprehensive aviation service provider based at the Terre Haute Regional Airport. The company offers a wide range of services, including flight instruction, aircraft delivery and ferry services, vintage plane parts, and aircraft brokering. Additionally, Malavolti Aviation operates a pilot shop and provides various other aviation-related services. With a strong foundation in serving the aviation community, Malavolti Aviation is committed to delivering high-quality services to meet the diverse needs of its clients. Whether you are a novice pilot seeking training or an experienced aviator requiring specialized services, Malavolti Aviation Services is dedicated to providing exceptional support and expertise.
